title: BEST OF 2019: Beachfront Bliss in Samoa with Luxurious Massages and Daily Dining
description: Picture yourself relaxing on a pristine beach under the tropical sun, azure water lapping at the sand... now treat yourself to an idyllic island escape at Sheraton Samoa Beach Resort, a beachfront oasis boasting excellent facilities and beautiful accommodation. Experience the ultimate island escape with six 30-minute massages, daily lunch or dinner featuring delicious local cuisine, a daily buffet breakfast, a welcome bottle of red or white wine, return transfers from Faleolo International Airport and more.

title: Beachfront Tranquility in Samoa with Nightly Cocktails
description: Discover a beachfront paradise offering barefoot splendour on the soft, pillowy shores of tropical Samoa. Enjoy a villa escape perched on the water’s edge of the Pacific Ocean and located just five minutes from the world-famous, emerald-green swimming hole of To Sua Ocean Trench. Enjoy daily continental breakfast, a nightly cocktail each, two dining experiences, return airport transfers, a romantic 60-minute couples’ massage and more.

title: Beachfront Bliss in Samoa with Luxurious Massages and Daily Dining Experiences
description: Picture yourself relaxing on a pristine beach under the tropical sun, azure-blue water lapping at the sand. Treat yourself to an idyllic island getaway at Sheraton Samoa Beach Resort, a beachfront oasis boasting excellent facilities and beautiful accommodation. Experience the ultimate island escape with six 30-minute massages, daily lunch or dinner featuring delicious local cuisine, a daily buffet breakfast, a welcome bottle of red or white wine, return transfers from Faleolo International Airport and more.

title: Sheraton Samoa Secluded Beachfront Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Massages
description:
Leave your daily life behind and escape to one of the world’s most stunning destinations with a luxury stay at Sheraton Samoa Beach Resort, an oceanfront oasis on the secluded shores of one of the South Pacific's most idyllic islands.

Paradise is at your fingertips thanks to a wealth of first-class facilities including a sparkling lagoon pool, indulgent spa, tennis courts, and a fun-filled kids' club. Mouthwatering local cuisine and skillfully crafted international dishes are showcased across the resort's restaurants and bars. Dine alfresco in the elegant setting of South Pacific Restaurant, enjoy Polynesian evening entertainment at Apolima Fale, or sip on a hand-crafted cocktail poolside while taking in sweeping ocean views.

Set against a backdrop of endless white shores lapped by rolling turquoise waves and a lush hinterland of green jungle, this adventure-lovers launchpad offers unparalleled access to world-class kayaking, snorkelling, paddle boarding, and cycling - just moments from the resort.

**Your** **handpicked inclusions:**

- Up to two children (12 years and under) stay and eat for free
- Enjoy daily buffet breakfast and dinner
- Toast to your island escape with a welcome bottle of wine
- Transcend into complete bliss with three 60-minute massages per package
- Relax with roundtrip airport transfers

**Suite Upgrade Bonus:** Heighten the indulgence when you upgrade to a One Bedroom Suite, Ocean View; or One Bedroom Larger Suite, Ocean View, where you'll enjoy a bonus two-course lunch for two once per stay.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** Right up until 14 days before check-in you can enjoy unlimited, free date changes, or cancel and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other Limited Time Lux Exclusive accommodation, tour or cruise offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.
